#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 char a[20000]={};
 gets(a);
 int i=0;
 while(a[i]!='\0')
 {
     char b;
     if(a[i]>='X')
     {
         b=a[i]-23;
         cout<<b;
     }
     else
     {
      b=a[i]+3;
     cout<<b;
     }

     i++;
 }
 cout<<endl;

return 0;
}
